```{r}
x1=c(1.79,1.84,2.01,1.90,1.94,2.09,2.15,2.23,1.81,1.69,2.17,2.36)
x2=c("linaza","soya","girazol","linaza","soya","girazol")
x3=c("c1","c1","c1","c2","c2","c2")
h=cbind(x1,x2,x3);colnames(h)=c("peso","tipo","comedero");h=as.data.frame(h);h
```

```{r}
mod=lm(h$peso~h$tipo*h$comedero)
anova(mod)
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(h, aes(x = tipo, y = peso,group=comedero)) +
  stat_summary(fun="mean", geom="line",aes(linetype = comedero,color=comedero))
```
